title: IoT Remote Lab
description: Created a smart weather monitor for automated gardening sprinklers using web of things standard from W3C. Incorporated APIs to fetch hourly weather forecast, store it in a 48 hour database and based on self-built weather model predict the rain to attain optimal plant growth.

title: Enterpreneurship
description: Lead as head of technology in a five person team from diverse backgrounds to build an Anti-poaching systems startup to combat illegal Rhino poaching in South Africa and neighbouring nations. Designed innovative solutions using drones, AI, and Computer vision to assist rangers and prevent direct combat with poachers. Collaborated with drone manufactorers and and space agency to devise a surveillance plan for tracking poaching incidents.

title: Embedded Systems Lab
description: Designed a light-Seeker Robot. Built a sensor using photo-resistors to determine direction of incoming light. Constructed a H-bridge that turns a Servo DC motor towards the light source. Researched a method to ramp the motorâ€™s acceleration to create a critically damped system.

title: Advanced Digital Design
description: Created a VHDL based Universal Asynchronous Receiver/Transmitter (UART) using XILINX Synthesis tool on Spartan-3 Starter Kit Board. Built a driver for 7 Segmend LED to display hexadecimal codes.
